About The Company

We’re More than a Manufacturing Company.

Quantun Engineering DPS is a consumer electronic manufacturing company that specialized in production of 

  • Light Bulbs
  • Solar Panels
  • Solar Streetlights
  • Floodlights
  • Solar Generators

    •  and other electrical and electronic devices and services. This is just the starting products which will be expanded to hundreds within the first year. Samples of our products have undergone serious and rigorous tests by Standards Organization of Nigeria (SON) and had the of relevant product certifications (MANCAP).

    WHAT WE’RE OFFERING

    Our Products

    Solar Generator

    A solar generator is a small capacity, stand alone SPV power system based on a PV array connected to a battery bank of appropriate size and an inverter of 12, 24 or 48 V.

    Solar Panels

    All over the world there is significant increase in usage of solar energy. Fuel replaced by Solar panel. Solar power is now the trend.

    LED Bulbs

    It's called solid-state lighting because unlike incandescent and fluorescent lighting technologies, there are no gases involved in LEDs(Light Emited Diode).

    All-in-one Solar Street Light

    Illumination is one of the factors for determining the development level of any community.All-In-One solar street and parking.

    Source Era Devolopment Board

    Prototyping platforms gives software/hardware developers a platform to ease the design and implementation of complete electronic solutions that lead to quality products.

    Flood Light

    Super Bright LED FLOOD LIGHT. for Compound Security, Outdoor even lighting, Large Church auditoriums, Filling stations, Gate House, etc.

    Recess Light

    It's called solid-state lighting because unlike incandescent and fluorescent lighting technologies, there are no gases involved in LEDs

    We’re Professionals

    Quality Materials

    INDUSTRIAL GROUPS

    We Create Big Things with Big Ideas

    Nigeria has a multi-disciplinary engineering setup with different cadres and engineering skills as contemporarily, the society is becoming increasingly global and technologically advanced. It is obvious that the country is becoming more populous with a high level of unemployed youths. As an engineering and manufacturing company, we have the capacity to provide very good training to these youths to improve their employability, and increase their confidence and skills to make themselves self-reliant as a prerequisite for sustainable peace to prevail.
